name: TokenERC20

attributes.documentation:
Constrctor function
     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
attributes.name: TokenERC20

attributes.documentation: Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
attributes.name: _transfer

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
     * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account
     * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
attributes.name: transfer
transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
     * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf
     * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
attributes.name: approve
approveAndCall

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.

attributes.documentation:
@dev user can signup to the Airdrop Central to receive token airdrops
Airdrops made before the user registration won't be available to them.
attributes.name: signUpForAirdrops

attributes.documentation:
@dev removes user from airdrop list.
Beware that token distribution for existing airdrops won't change.
For example: if 100 tokens were to be distributed to 10 people (10 each).
if one quitted from the list, the other 9 will still get 10 each.
@notice WARNING: Quiting from the airdrop central will make you lose
tokens not yet withdrawn. Make sure to withdraw all pending tokens before
removing yourself from this list. Signing up later will not give you the older tokens back
attributes.name: quitFromAirdrops
getTokensAvailableToMe
